snippet.title: Arkanoid: Eternal Battle Reveal Trailer - Official Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2022
snippet.description:
Classic brickbreaker Arkanoid is back with Arkanow: Eternal Battle, a new take on the classic formula. Play solo or play Eternal Battle, a new 25 player brickbreaker battle royale mode. Arkanow comes to PC and consoles in October 2022.

#GameTrailers
